raw_input: How can we reduce latency in real-time collaborative editing systems?
What are the lived experiences of first-generation college students navigating academic identity?
I want to design a new framework for evaluating AI literacy in K-12 education.
The notion of 'digital natives' is fundamentally flawed and needs to be re-examined.
I want to explore how participatory design can be used to build better accessibility tools while challenging existing usability assumptions.
